select a.*,
b.userid as userid, b.username as username, c.groupid as logingroupid, c.groupname as logingroupname, d.roleid as loginroleid, d.rolename as loginrolename, (select c.bmname from sa_businessmodel c where guid = (select b.bmguid from sa_group b where b.guid = a.logingroupguid ) ) bmname
